intro_texto_01: Now you can more quickly and easily track the expenses of your vehicle.
intro_texto_04: Or even for a family trip
intro_texto_05: Track your vehicle expenses with TankiFy.
google_play_breve_descricao: Keep your car healthy and control all your expenses with TankiFy.
google_play_text: Manage your vehicle expenses quickly and easily. With TankiFy you can track refueling and maintenance services, generate reports, and setup reminders for important events for your vehicle.
google_play_screen_01: Register your refuellings and check them whenever you need.
google_play_screen_02: Track the expenses for one or more vehicles.
google_play_screen_03: Full reports about refuelings, expenses and services.
google_plays_creen_04: Generate detailed charts, which you can save and share.
google_play_screen_05: Calculate the autonomy of your vehicles directly within TankiFy.
google_play_screen_06: On mobile or tablet, keep your spending updated.
google_play_screen_07: A modern design that fits your needs.
ja_sabe_quanto_gasta: Now you know how much you spend on your vehicle.
merecer_estrelas: Don't you think we deserve 5 stars?

restaurar_backup_descricao: If you have changed your phone, restore your data here.
restaurar_backup_descricao_3: You can also restore data from other apps.
assinatura_cancelada: Your subscription has been cancelled! Your benefits will be available until the end of your subscription period.
checklist_descricao_02: The vehicular checklist helps you identify and fix safety issues before they become dangerous. Items such as brakes, tires, lights and seat belts can be checked regularly to ensure the vehicle is in safe operating condition.
teste_gratuitamente_descricao: Registration takes less than 1 minute and the test is without obligation.
home_about_car: How do you manage your vehicle or your fleet?
home_tankify_desc: TankiFy is the ideal tool for you who are concerned with the conservation and cost management of your vehicle.
home_timeline_text_2: + 100 thousand reviews average of 4.8 out of 5
home_personal_use_sub: Know exactly how much you are spending on your vehicle and don't miss any maintenance.
home_personal_use_desc: TankiFy - Vehicle Management is the free version of the application for personal use. It allows you to have total control over your vehicle costs: refueling, maintenance, oil changes and other services performed in the car, motorcycle, truck or bus.
home_corporate_use_sub: Manage your fleet of vehicles easily and quickly using your mobile phone, tablet or computer.
home_corporate_use_desc: TankiFy is a system for managing vehicle fleets, which gives the manager total control over vehicles and drivers. Track all refueling, expenses and services, schedule all appointments for each vehicle and driver.
home_corporate_use_benefit_control_expen: Record all refueling, expenses, income and any other costs related to your vehicle.
home_corporate_use_benefit_discover_desc: Have control over your vehicle's performance through reports, graphs and timeline.
home_corporate_use_benefit_warn_desc: Schedule reminders and keep revisions, maintenance and payments up to date.
home_corporate_use_benefit_economy_desc: Using TankiFy you are on the right path to make the best choices.
home_practicality: Simple, easy and fast vehicle management
home_practicality_desc: Register, organize and track all the information on your car, motorcycle, truck, bus or fleet whenever you want and wherever you are, via smartphone, tablet or computer.
saber_como_funciona_na_pratica: Want to know how TankiFy works in practice?
faq_title: Choose one of the topics below or do a search and get your questions answered about TankiFy.
faq_form_subtitle: Send a message with your question, it will be a pleasure to help you.
contact_form_subtitle: We would like your opinion, send your question, suggestion or complaint.
download_title: Want to control spending on your vehicle?
personal_page_info_text_part1: TankiFy - Vehicle Management is an application for managing vehicles for personal use. It allows the user to have control over fueling, maintenance, oil changes and other services performed on the vehicle.
personal_page_info_text_part2: The information about your vehicle is customized through reports and graphs, with information on average Km/litre, purchased expenses, averages per day, fuel used, among others.
personal_page_info_text_part3: By using this application, you will have financial control of your vehicle in your hands, making it easier for you to choose the best option for fueling.
personal_page_answer_part1: Do you know how much you spend on your vehicle? When should you do the next review? Which fuel is most efficient for your vehicle?
personal_page_app_feedback: + 100 thousand reviews - average of 4.8 out of 5
corporate_page_info_text_part1: TankiFy is a vehicle fleet management system that allows the manager to have full control over vehicles and drivers.
corporate_page_info_text_part2: Currently, the system has modules for managing refuellings, expenses, recipes, services, routes, checklists and reminders.
corporate_page_info_text_part3: Ask for your quote for more details on using this system.
corporate_page_answer_part1: Do you know how much you spend on your vehicles? When should you do the next reviews? When does a driver's license expire?
resposta_todas_pergunstas_no_tankify: The answers to all these questions and many more are in TankiFy!
corporate_page_fast_ready: Your fleet management system ready in less than 5 minutes.
corporate_page_system_ready: Your system is ready to use.
corporate_create_account_and_start_now_b: Create your account and get started right now
fleet_management_how_much: How much does it cost to use TankiFy?
estimate_form_desc: Didn't find the plan for your needs? Got any questions? Fill in the form and we will contact you.
alert_error: Something went wrong, please try again.
payment_form_crypto_desc: Pay your annual TankiFy subscription with cryptocurrency
payment_form_crypto_checkin: Send the receipt and email address for your TankiFy account to: support@tankify.com
keywords_home: vehicle management, fleet management, vehicles, software, app, refueling, driver
keywords_fleet_management: fleet management, fleet control, software, system, refueling, expenses, services, checklist
keywords_personal_use: app, android, ios, apple, fuel control, driver app
keywords_faq: application, android, ios, apple, fuel control, driver app, system, refueling, expenses, services, checklist
keywords_crypto: application, app, subscription, crypto, cryptocurrency, payment, payment options
personal_01_info_01: Fuel control is the most important part of managing your vehicle. With the application, you can fill in the refuelling data in real time, giving more agility to the management.
personal_01_info_02: From the information filled in, graphs and reports are generated that allow access to data such as: average consumption, costs per kilometer traveled, kilometers traveled, among others.
personal_01_info_03: The resource allows you to easily identify if there is a problem with the vehicle and if there is a need for maintenance.
personal_02_info_01: TankiFy allows you to have total control over your vehicle's expenses, registering taxes, insurance, fines, parking, among other expenses.
personal_02_info_02: All information is displayed in several reports, which can be divided by date, type or period. The visualization of information through graphs facilitates understanding, making the evolution of expenses with your vehicle clearer.
personal_03_info_01: TankiFy also makes it possible to record recipes, to make life easier for drivers who use their vehicle as a work tool, such as transport app drivers, for example.
personal_03_info_02: If that's your case, you can count on this functionality to follow, in real time, the expenses and income related to the vehicle.
personal_04_info_01: Oil changes, brake checks, tire changes, filters, air conditioning cleaning. All these services can be easily viewed in the app.
personal_04_info_02: The moment you pick up the vehicle from the mechanics, you can enter the services performed, keeping the expense and maintenance history always up to date.
personal_05_info_01: Having scheduled preventive maintenance is another fundamental activity in managing your vehicle.
personal_05_info_02: With the help of the app, you can set reminders to control regular services such as oil change, tire replacement, inspection and overhaul, being able to schedule by kilometer or date.
personal_05_info_03: Thus, you program yourself in advance and avoid spending on future problems.
personal_06_info_01: Clearly view and monitor the evolution of information related to your vehicle is possible through reports and graphs available in the application.
personal_06_info_02: This feature facilitates the analysis of your vehicle's expenses and performance, separated by date or type, helping in decision making.
corporate_01_info: Identify the average consumption of vehicles by type of fuel, gas stations and drivers.
corporate_02_info: Completely control your fleet expenses: vehicle fees, financing, insurance, fines, tolls, among others.
corporate_03_info: Manage all preventive and corrective maintenance, a fundamental practice for the proper functioning of the fleet, avoiding unexpected costs.
corporate_04_info: Have complete control of drivers in each vehicle, manage driver's licenses, get reports by vehicle and period.
corporate_05_info: You can schedule expenses and services as needed, within the Reminders module, being able to schedule by km or date.
corporate_06_info: Access the information of each vehicle, separated by date and modules. Visualize the performance of the fleet through graphs, which help in decision making.
